title: (x) Tic Tac logo - (similar to) Gills Kayo, Today Sans {Hrant, Yves}
content:
anyone know what font is used in the tic tac logo? or a close substitute?   
   
 ![tictac.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110301112657im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/3042.jpg)
author: anonymous

comments.content: You could also try [Today Sans Ultra](http://web.archive.org/web/20110301112657/http:/www.myfonts.com/FontStyle62308.html). Lowercase "a" resembles your sample more, but lowercase "t" is not exactly the same neither :/ I guess it's up to you, ticTacSucka!
